question: Phil Hogan, who has tendered his resignation, was the Trade Commissioner of which international association?
explanation:
The European Unionâ€™s Trade Commissioner Phil Hogan has submitted his resignation after several days of allegation that he has breached Covid-19 guidelines while he travelled to his native Ireland.
This action is expected to be a black spot for the team led by the European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen. The European Commission has been working on the 750 billion-euro recovery fund for EU economies.
